title: Loving You Is Hurtful - Novel Updates
tags: Affair   Female Protagonist   Marriage   Modern Day   Slow Romance
author: 爱哭的小魔王
description:
Her husband and elder sister had an accident while having a limo sex. But she was treated as dirt. She loved Fu Haochen deeply but had to stand it when the two made a public display of affection every day. 'Fu Haochen, I'm a woman and I can also be jealous. My heart hurts badly. Since you don't love me, then let's have a divorce.' Luo Enxi left a divorce agreement and got in the plane which then crashed. 'Luo Enxi, you want to leave me like this? Only in your dreams!'
>
